page.title: 14ROADS AND TRANSPORT
page.content: NEAR WHERE WE LIVE THERE IS A GATE CALLED STAG GATE THAT IS ON THE A31 WHICH RUNS FROM WIMBORNE TO DORCHESTER .THESE DAYS OUR SORTS OF TRANSPORT ARE CARS,LORRIES,BUSES AND VANS.MOST FAMILYS HAVE CARS AND IT IS SOMETIMES DIFFICULT TO GET TO SCHOOL AT 3.15PM BECAUSE THERE ARE SO MANY CARS PARKED OUTSIDE.WE HAVE A CAR WHICH WE CALL VIOLET.WE ALSO HAVE A VAN IT USED TO BE A POSTAL VAN BUT MY FRIEND BOUGHT IT AND HE GAVE IT TO MY DAD.SOME ROADS HAVE THINGS WHICH ARE PLACED IN THE MIDDLE OF THE ROAD AT NIGHT WHEN LIGHTS SHINE ON THEM THE LIGHT IS REFLECTED SO THEY LOOK BRIGHTER AND THEY HELP YOU TO FIND YOUR WAY.
